entities.name: the dark mark
entities.description: The Dark Mark is a symbol associated with Voldemort's followers. It is mentioned that the Death Eaters would have been pleased to see it.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is the main antagonist of the story. His name is avoided by most people in the wizarding world.

entities.name: the weasleys
entities.description: The Weasleys are a family that avoids saying Voldemort's name. Mr. Weasley is mentioned as speaking about You-Know-Who.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the main protagonist of the story. He asks questions about the Death Eaters and their actions.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Ron Weasley is Harry's friend. He asks a question about why the Death Eaters would Disapparate when they saw the Dark Mark.

entities.name: bill weasley
entities.description: Bill Weasley is mentioned as saying 'Use your brains, Ron' and explaining that if the Death Eaters were really working for Voldemort, they would have been caught by now.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: The Death Eaters are followers of Voldemort. They are mentioned as having worked hard to keep out of Azkaban when You-Know-Who lost power.

entities.name: azkaban
entities.description: Azkaban is a prison for wizards and witches. The Death Eaters tried to avoid being caught by hiding there.

entities.name: you-know-who
entities.description: You-Know-Who is Voldemort's name that most people in the wizarding world use instead of saying his actual name.

relationships.description: Harry Potter asks questions about You-Know-Who's supporters, and Mr. Weasley is mentioned as speaking about them.
Ron Weasley is Bill Weasley's brother.
The Death Eaters are followers of Voldemort.
The Death Eaters tried to avoid being caught by hiding in Azkaban.
You-Know-Who is Voldemort's name that most people use instead of saying his actual name.
